title: The Devil's Due
description: Rose Aguilar should have never come back to Eagle ValleyWith the war in Eagle Valley in full swing, Rose finds herself the target of the cartel's ruthless and heavy-handed tactics when they take her south of the border. Time is running out for Joseph Warner.The violence and bloodshed is taking its toll on Joseph, and he finds himself slowly succumbing to the pressure of both leading the Nine Devils in the fight for their lives and fighting to get Rose back from the clutches of the cartel. They have to save each other if they want to save themselvesA last ditch rescue attempt will take Joseph south of the border in the hopes of negotiating a cease-fire and rescuing Rose. But he will soon find that Rose won't be the only one who needs saving.
author: Candice Owen
